events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported problem has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
A support agent has been assigned to handle your refund inquiry promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Here is a photo of the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and arrange for the incorrect item to be returned.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and helpful solution.
Your refund has been processed and the return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm you received your refund and to check if everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
